name: Comeback Add to Collection to AMO
description: Mozilla removed the "add to" button from the add-ons details page. But this style sheet that modifies addons.mozilla.org to show the old collection widgets.
additional_info:
You can get more detail about removed "add to" button from here.
"No favorite button in new AMO design? - Add-ons / addons.mozilla.org - Mozilla Discourse" https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/t/no-favorite-button-in-new-amo-design/8015 "Add to Collection :: Add-ons for Firefox" https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/add-to-collection/
